components.blocks:
forever
	point towards [mouse-pointer]
	move (10) steps
end
components.text: Try varying the number of steps it moves forward and see what happens

components.blocks:
if <not <touching [mouse-pointer]>> then
	point towards [mouse-pointer]
	move (10) steps
end
components.text: Check if the sprite is touching the mouse before it does anything

steps.description: Get the spaceship to follow your mouse

components.blocks:
if <touching [spaceship]> then
	say (timer) for (2) secs
	end
